oZJkBA.en:
[Basta]
I'm the very best
balcksmith, Basta!
I usually don't refine general items but,
I do for the items with
refine level over 10.
oZJkBA.pt:
[Basta]
I'm the very best
balcksmith, Basta!
I usually don't refine general items but,
I do for the items with
refine level over 10.

opJkBA.en:
[Basta]
Anyway if any equipment you're having
on your body is over refine level
I can do more refining.
What item do you want to refine?
opJkBA.pt:
[Basta]
Anyway if any equipment you're having
on your body is over refine level
I can do more refining.
What item do you want to refine?

rZJkBA.en:
[Basta]
Were your head was an equipment?
rZJkBA.pt:
[Basta]
Were your head was an equipment?

[Basta]
What should I do for you...
rpJkBA.pt:
[Basta]

[Basta]

r5JkBA.pt:
[Basta]
Making artificial hand is not my specialty.

Making artificial hand is not my specialty...
sJJkBA.pt:

spJkBA.pt:

[Basta]
Well... I don't see any item to refine.
tZJkBA.pt:
[Basta]

[Basta]
Huh, what do you want me to do?
tpJkBA.pt:

t5JkBA.en:
[Basta]
This item can't be refined. I can do nothing.
t5JkBA.pt:
[Basta]
This item can't be refined. I can do nothing.

uJJkBA.en:
[Basta]
This item can't be refined because it has not been identified.
uJJkBA.pt:
[Basta]
This item can't be refined because it has not been identified.

uZJkBA.en:
[Basta]
I told you huh? I don't handle items below refine level 10.
uZJkBA.pt:
[Basta]
I told you huh? I don't handle items below refine level 10.

upJkBA.en:
[Basta]
Hm. Are you okay with this?
To refine this equipment
you need 1 HD Carnium
and 100000zeny.
Are you sure you want this?
upJkBA.pt:
[Basta]
Hm. Are you okay with this?
To refine this equipment
you need 1 HD Carnium
and 100000zeny.
Are you sure you want this?

vZJkBA.en:
[Basta]
This defense item is already been refined
many times..If you do more
its refine level might get lowered.
vZJkBA.pt:
[Basta]
This defense item is already been refined
many times..If you do more
its refine level might get lowered.

vpJkBA.en:
[Basta]
But there would be no case lowering
down like 3 levels. I'm different from,
other blacksmiths. At most you'd get
1 level lowered.
vpJkBA.pt:
[Basta]
But there would be no case lowering
down like 3 levels. I'm different from,
other blacksmiths. At most you'd get

v5JkBA.en:
[Basta]
The risk is lower than other refiners.
Are you going to try it?
I've warned you enough...
v5JkBA.pt:
[Basta]
The risk is lower than other refiners.
